titles.title: He Giveth More Grace When The Burdens Grow Greater

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He giveth more grace when the burdens grow greater.
He sendeth more strength when the labors increase.
To added afflictions He addeth His mercies,
To multiplied trials, His multiplied peace.
Chorus:
His love has no limit.
His grace has no measure.
His power no boundery known unto man.
For out of His infinite riches in Jesus
He giveth, and giveth, and giveth again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When we have exhausted our store of endurance.
When our strength has failed 'ere the day is half done.
When we reach the end of our hoarded resources,
Our Father's full giving is only begun.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Su gracia es mayor, si las pruebas aumentan
Su gracia es mayor, si la lucha es más cruel
Si grande es la lucha, mayor es su gracia
Si grande es la prueba, su amor es más fiel

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Su amor no termina, su gracia no acaba
Un límite no hay al amor de Jesús
Pues de sus inmensas riquezas en gloria
Abundan sus dones, abunda su amor

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Si a veces las noches, se tornan oscuras
Y el cielo de bronce, parece que es
No te desanimes, El está a tu lado
Y aunque no le veas, su amor siempre es fiel
